name: JAN VIKAS SAMITI

address: Jan Vikas Samiti, Provincialate C/0 Anjali (Matridham Ashara), Cristnagar (Po)

briefDescription: Jan Vikas Samiti is an organisation working in the field of disability and development since 1997. Our focus areas are Children & Youth with disabilities, Women, adolescent girls and other marginalized section of the society.
